column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Ikki says : " It seems pretty lonely out here .
#Text=" Outpost soldier # 2 says : " He 's just upset because Kuvira 's taking all the troops to Zaofu and we had to stay here .
#Text=" Outpost soldier # 1 says : " Well it 's the last city left and then the whole empire will be united !
#Text=And you know there 's gon na be a huge party afterwards .
#Text=" Ikki says : " It 's tough to be left out , huh ?
#Text=I know exactly what you 're going through .
#Text=" Outpost soldier # 1 says : " You do ?
#Text=" Ikki says : " Yeah .
#Text=My brother and sister are always leaving me out of fun stuff .
#Text=I mean , we 're supposed to be looking for the Avatar together , but they wo n't even let me help .
#Text=" Outpost soldier # 2 says : " Well , that 's not fair .
#Text=Maybe we can help you out !
#Text=So , where have you looked for her ?
#Text=" Ikki says : " We 've been traveling down the west coast , and the only lead we have is some guy who said he saw her six months ago .
#Text=" Outpost soldier # 1 says : " Well , we have troops ... pretty much everywhere .
#Text=If anyone saw her , they would have reported it .
#Text=" Ikki says : " What about this place ?
#Text=" Outpost soldier # 1 says : " Well , that 's the swamp .
#Text=No one goes there .
#Text=" Outpost soldier # 2 says : " Do n't get discouraged , Ikki .
#Text=You 're a valuable member of the team , and you have a big heart !
#Text=I know you 're going to find her .
#Text=Now let 's get you out of those ropes .
#Text=" Meelo says : " You 're welcome , Ikki .
#Text=" Ikki says : " Why did you do that ?
#Text=" Jinora says : " We 're saving you .
#Text=Let 's go .
#Text=" Ikki says : " I had everything under control .
#Text=I just found our food , and I have an idea where Korra is .
#Text=" Jinora says : " You do ?
#Text=Then lets get going !
#Text=" Ikki says : " Hold on .
#Text=Sorry my brother and sister knocked you out .
#Text=Nice chatting with you !
#Text=" Outpost soldier # 2 says : " Ugh ... Macaroon ... " Toph says : " There you are .
#Text=You got my dinner yet ?
#Text=" Korra says : " No ... this swamp ... it did crazy things to my mind .
#Text=I had visions , of all the times my enemies hurt me .
#Text=" Toph says : " Yeah , I figured something like that might happen .
#Text=" Korra says : " What ?
#Text=You wanted me to see those visions ?
#Text=You are one twisted old lady , you know that ?
#Text=" Toph says : " Look , I know you want to get better .
#Text=And so does the swamp !
#Text=It can sense you 're out of balance .
#Text=It will teach you what you need to learn , if you 're open to listening .
#Text=" Korra says : " Okay , swamp .
#Text=I 'm all ears .
#Text=" Toph says : " You said you saw your past enemies .
#Text=Now , why do you think that is ?
#Text=" Korra says : " I do n't know .
#Text=Because they made me and a lot of other people suffer .
#Text=" Toph says : " Sounds like you 're carrying around your former enemies , the same way you 're still carrying around that metal poison .
#Text=You maybe consider you could learn something from them ?
#Text=" Korra says : " Sounds like the swamp is messing with your mind too .
#Text=" Toph says : " My mind is just fine , thank you .
#Text=Listen , what did Amon want ?
#Text=Equality for all .
#Text=Unalaq ?
#Text=He brought back the spirits .
#Text=And Zaheer believed in freedom .
#Text=" Korra says : " I guess ... " Toph says : " The problem was , those guys were totally out of balance and they took their ideologies too far .
#Text=" Korra says : " Okay , fine .
#Text=But that does n't explain why they keep haunting me .
#Text=" Toph says : " Because you need to face your fears .
#Text=You ca n't expect to deal with future enemies if you 're still fighting the old ones .
#Text=" Korra says : " Maybe you 're right , but how am I supposed to move on ?
#Text=" Toph says : " Boy , you Avatars sure need a lot of hand - holding .
#Text=Get up !
#Text=We 're going to the banyan - grove tree .
#Text=" Ikki says : " Those soldiers said there were n't any troops here and , I figure , if Korra 's not feeling good , she might come to a spiritual place like this to get better .
#Text=" Jinora says : " There is an enormous amount of spiritual activity here , but I do n't feel Korra .
#Text=" Meelo says : " Well , that 's what we get for listening to Ikki .
#Text=" Ikki says : " Guys !
#Text=We just got here .
#Text=Let 's at least look around .
#Text=" Jinora says : " I 'm sorry , Ikki , but I 'm with Meelo on this .
#Text=I do n't think we 're going to find her here .
#Text=Let 's go Pepper !
#Text=" Meelo says : " Why did those stupid vines pull us in here anyway ?
#Text=" Ikki says : " Because they want us here .
#Text=I 'm telling you , Korra has got to be close .
#Text=" Jinora says : " I do n't know , Ikki , I still do n't sense Korra .
#Text=" Ikki says : " Well , you have n't sensed her the entire time we 've been looking for her !
#Text=" Meelo says : " Next time I go on a mission , it 's going to be boys only .
#Text=Just Poki and me .
#Text=" Korra says : " It 's beautiful .
#Text=" Toph says : " The roots of the banyan - grove tree spread out for miles in every direction , connecting this whole swamp .
#Text=Your problem is , you 've been disconnected for too long .
#Text=Disconnected from the people who love you and disconnected from yourself .
#Text=" Meelo says : " I 'm tired of listening to you !
#Text=" Jinora says : " Korra !
#Text=I know where Korra is !
#Text=" Meelo and Ikki says : " Yeah !
#Text="
